meta_description: Looking for a fast-track office fit out or refurbishment? GXI Group offers end-to-end solutions, specializing in affordable and high-quality office spaces. Contact us for estimated costs per square foot for your CAT A or CAT B fit out.

Protect your website with Cloudflare's email address hiding feature. Enable Javascript to decode email addresses and prevent access from malicious bots. Discover how Cloudflare can safeguard your website.

Looking for fast-track office fit out and refurbishments in London? Our company specializes in creating efficient and performance-boosting office spaces for small and medium-sized businesses. From planning to aftercare, we offer a fully integrated service. Contact us for workplace refurbishment, partitions, IT infrastructure, furniture, consultancy, and wellbeing services.
Planning an office move? This guide provides essential tips, from creating a detailed plan to selecting the right moving company. Ensure an efficient and stress-free move with our expert advice.
GXI Group specializes in fast-track office fit out and refurbishments. Find information, services, and contact details on our website. Terms and conditions apply.
